content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price is non-negotiable. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. If you are interested, it would be 1000 Euro per month. Remember, I'm not here to discuss anything but the rental price. So, if you agree to the price of 1000 Euro, I would say 'I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!' If you don't agree, please let me know and we can end the negotiation with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
